Task Description: Setup Django REST Framework, Docker, PostgreSQL, and JWT authentication boilerplate.
Create React app with Vite + Tailwind CSS, add routing, and configure Docker Compose.
Add GitHub Actions, PR templates, branch protections, and base lint/test workflows.
Add user model (TA/Student), endpoints `/api/auth/register` & `/api/auth/login`, update Swagger schema_v0.1.yml.
Build pages for user registration and login using MSW mocks, later connect to real backend API.
Endpoints `/api/courses/`, `/api/courses/{id}/sections/`, options for max_slots_per_student, restrict_to_section.
Create form-based UI for TAs to create/manage courses and sections, mock until backend merged.

Task Title: Add Slot creation and recurrence logic
Task Description: Add `/api/sections/{id}/slots/` endpoint for recurring slots with buffer logic and conflict prevention.
Use FullCalendar to display generated slots and allow recurring setup by TA.
Create `/api/schedule/{uuid}/` to show section availability and handle student access control.
Add public calendar view for students using link, with available slot selection UI.

Task Title: Implement Booking Logic and Email Notifications
Task Description: Add `/api/slots/{slot_id}/book/`, enforce max slots per student, send email confirmations via Mailhog.
Create booking confirmation dialogs and success/failure screens, integrated with backend.
Add `/api/sections/{id}/upload_students/`, support CSV or Excel, parse emails, and store allowed students.
Create upload form with preview summary (valid, duplicate, invalid emails).
Add `/api/bookings/{id}/feedback/` endpoint for student feedback on session quality.
Students can leave feedback (rating/comments) after session completion.
Implement `/api/analytics/section/{id}/` for attendance, rating, and booking trends.
Charts (Recharts) for bookings, feedback averages, and student activity over time.
Seed database with sample data, polish UI/UX, verify booking flows, and record demo video.
Add stricter input validation, secure file uploads, JWT refresh tokens, and email domain verification.
Add toasts, loading states, better validation messages, and mobile responsiveness.
Test app across browsers and mobile devices, fix UI inconsistencies.
Add indexes, pagination, and caching to endpoints to improve API performance.
Use React Query caching, code splitting, and prefetching for performance.
Configure production Docker Compose, add environment variables, and deploy to Render/Heroku/DigitalOcean.
Configure SSL (via Nginx/Certbot), enable Django logging and error monitoring (Sentry optional).
Configure GitHub Actions to build and deploy frontend automatically on push to main.
Document endpoints, setup guide, and architecture diagrams. Include Swagger link and testing instructions.
Create TA and Student user guides with screenshots and feature overview.
Run full system test, finalize release branch, prepare version tag (v1.0.0).
Deploy stable version to production. Publish release notes and share demo video.
Allow TAs to sync their office hours automatically with Google Calendar.
Add toggle to sync TA slots with Google Calendar via OAuth.
Collect user feedback and plan enhancements for next semester.
Finalize all code, optimize Docker image sizes, cleanup docs, and mark version 1.1 stable.
